short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate ChatGPT conversations more easily with navigation buttons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrolling through a ChatGPT conversation can become a struggle the longer the conversation is, especially when the responses get quite long. Manually scrolling may make you overlook prompts and make you lose track of the conversation. ChatGPT Scroller exists to allow you to easily scroll to particular messages using buttons.

Please reach out to the developer if you face any issues.
